long_description: Includes both 2 point and 3 point shots made
Includes both 2 point and 3 point shot attempts
Field goals made over field goals attempted
Free throws made over free throws attempted
Sum of offensive and defensive rebounds
Not available per player in games tracked in simple mode
Not available per player in games tracked in simple mode
Standard European measurement of player's efficiency. The calculation includes numbers which are not always available in simple mode so cannot be compared between simple and tracking mode.

description: Plus/Minus reflects the difference between points scored and conceded by the team while the player was on court
